msg: Removed documentation todos that have been done

author: cmlenz
msg: More resources in the sitemap documented

author: cmlenz
msg: - StartServerHelper and StopServerHelper removed. They had been added to support the extra tasks StartServerTask and StopServerTask, which don't exist anymore.
- Corresponding logic simplified and moved into RunServerTestsTask
- <runservertests> now supports nested <start>, <stop> and <test> elements, which are TaskContainers
- Scripts updated to use a nested <test> element instead of the testtask attribute, which I'd like to remove as soon as this solution has been verified
